name: Lotus 1-2-3 SmartMaster File
summary: A 12M file is a spreadsheet created by Lotus 1-2-3, which is part of IBM Lotus SmartSuite. It contains a pre-designed spreadsheet that allows a user to enter information to create forecasts, financial statements, and budgets. 12M files also include formulas, formatting, and print ranges.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
